issue.title: [C++][Docs] Use consistent terminology for nulls (min_count) in scalar aggregate kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13018](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13018). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example, the current `pc.sum` docstring has

```Java

Null values are ignored. Minimum count of non-NA
values can be set and NAN is returned if too few are present.
This can be changed through ScalarAggregateOptions.
```

which uses both NA and NAN in addition to "null".
